DEMO_010_MSG_010:
́Woo-oah! That was a-mazing! You really showed that
monster a thing or two...
ā
DEMO_010_MSG_020:
́However, there's much more to being a true Monster Master than winning battles!
ā
DEMO_010_MSG_030: ́If you recall, I mentioned about scouting monsters you meet and convincing them to join your team!
DEMO_010_MSG_040:
́If you simply use the "Scout" command against a monster during combat, you may succeed in recruiting it to your team!
ā
DEMO_010_MSG_050: ́When you use "Scout", your allied monsters will channel their strength, displaying to the opponent just how powerful you are.
DEMO_010_MSG_060: ́If all goes well, the monster will recognize your strength and choose to join your team of monsters.
DEMO_010_MSG_070:
́However, scouting does not always succeed! When this happens, the monster may become very enraged!
ā
DEMO_010_MSG_080: ́Don't get down on yourself, though... Perseverance is the most important trait of a Monster Master, after all!
